8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

status-bar-label-pane

Generic function

Summary

Returns the gadget that displays the label of the specified status bar.

Signature

status-bar-label-pane status-bar => label

Arguments

status-bar
An instance of type <status-bar>.

Values

label
An instance of type false-or(<label>).

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Returns the gadget that displays the label of status-bar.

Example

Create a status bar with a label as follows:

*status* := contain(make(<status-bar>, 
                         value-range: 
                           range(from: 0, to: 100),
                         label: "Status"));

The pane that the label of the status bar is displayed in can be returned with the following call:

status-bar-label-pane(*status*);

See also

<status-bar>, page 651

status-bar-progress-bar, page 655

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
